reference.title: Collection Server configuration
reference.shortdesc: The following is a sample rtms.properties file for a HPE RTMS Collection Server configuration:

section.screen: #SNMP Entity# # Configure the SNMP transport listen address listenIpAddress=0.0.0.0 # Configure the SNMP transport listen port listenPort=161 # Configure the retry counter for the SNMP Commands commandRetryCounter=5 #Thread Pool Size threadPool=25 # Communication fails then SNMP retries count to connect with SNMP Agent retriesCount = 3 # Communication fails then SNMP retries count to connect with SNMP Agent in milliseconds retriesTimeOut = 3000 hardwireOperating system DL380p or BL460c Series server with the following configuration:2 x 8 core Gen8 CPU clocked at 2.6GHz or better64 GB or higher RAM6 x 1.2 TB 10K RPM Hard Disks configured in RAID 62 x 1 Gbps NIC cards For BL460c series servers, the number of disks in a blade is limited. This limits the total number of nodes that can be monitored by RTMS unless complimented with a storage blade and/or a disk array, which is used for the database storage.
